article.title: Hyten Assigned to Air Force Space Command

tags.tag: Air Force Space Command. Joint Functional Component Command for Space

article.text: Lt. Gen. John E. Hyten, USAF, has been nominated for assignment as commander, Fourteenth Air Force (Air Forces Strategic), Air Force Space Command, and commander, Joint Functional Component Command for Space, U.S. Strategic Command, Vandenberg Air Force Base, California.
